channel.title: [SOLVED] Gpio_issues: Error Operation not permitted
channel.description:
I'm triyng to activate my gpio in pin 22 like in the demo of the sample App "PowerLed" but I'm getting this error
``` Nov 29 11:42:52 swi-mdm9x28-wp user.err kernel: [10237.486788] gpio-9 (sysfs): _gpiod_direction_output_raw: tried to set a GPIO tied to an IRQ as output Nov 29 11:42:52 swi-mdm9x28-wp user.emerg Legato: *EMR* | gpioService[1399]/sysfsGpio T=main | gpioSysfsUtils.c WriteSysGpioSignalAttr() 202 | Failed to write out to GPIO config /sys/class/gpio/gpio22/direction. Error Operation not permitted Nov 29 11:42:52 swi-mdm9x28-wp user.err kernel: [10237.535876] gpio-9 (sysfs): _gpiod_direction_output_raw: tried to set a GPIO tied to an IRQ as output Nov 29 11:42:52 swi-mdm9x28-wp user.emerg Legato: *EMR* | gpioService[1399]/sysfsGpio T=main | gpioSysfsUtils.c WriteSysGpioSignalAttr() 202 | Failed to write out to GPIO config /sys/class/gpio/gpio22/direction. Error Operation not permitted Nov 29 11:42:52 swi-mdm9x28-wp user.err Legato: =ERR= | gpioService[1399]/sysfsGpio T=main | gpioSysfsUtils.c gpioSysfs_Activate() 751 | Failed to set Direction on GPIO gpio22 Nov 29 11:42:52 swi-mdm9x28-wp user.emerg Legato: *EMR* | gpioService[1399]/sysfsGpio T=main | gpioSysfsUtils.c gpioSysfs_SetChangeCallback() 596 | Only one change handler can be registered Nov 29 11:42:52 swi-mdm9x28-wp user.info Legato: INFO | gpioService[1399]/sysfsGpio T=main | gpioSysfsUtils.c gpioSysfs_SessionCloseHandlerFunc() 1178 | Releasing GPIO 22
```

item.dc:creator: asyal
item.description:
Can you share your code?

item.title: [SOLVED] Gpio_issues: Error Operation not permitted
item.dc:creator: SRNV
item.description:
I’m triyng to activate my gpio in pin 22 like in the demo of the sample App “PowerLed”
but I’m getting this error

Nov 29 11:42:52 swi-mdm9x28-wp user.err kernel: [10237.486788] gpio-9 (sysfs): _gpiod_direction_output_raw: tried to set a GPIO tied to an IRQ as output
Nov 29 11:42:52 swi-mdm9x28-wp user.emerg Legato: *EMR* | gpioService[1399]/sysfsGpio T=main | gpioSysfsUtils.c WriteSysGpioSignalAttr() 202 | Failed to write out to GPIO config /sys/class/gpio/gpio22/direction. Error Operation not permitted
Nov 29 11:42:52 swi-mdm9x28-wp user.err kernel: [10237.535876] gpio-9 (sysfs): _gpiod_direction_output_raw: tried to set a GPIO tied to an IRQ as output
Nov 29 11:42:52 swi-mdm9x28-wp user.emerg Legato: *EMR* | gpioService[1399]/sysfsGpio T=main | gpioSysfsUtils.c WriteSysGpioSignalAttr() 202 | Failed to write out to GPIO config /sys/class/gpio/gpio22/direction. Error Operation not permitted
Nov 29 11:42:52 swi-mdm9x28-wp user.err Legato: =ERR= | gpioService[1399]/sysfsGpio T=main | gpioSysfsUtils.c gpioSysfs_Activate() 751 | Failed to set Direction on GPIO gpio22
Nov 29 11:42:52 swi-mdm9x28-wp user.emerg Legato: *EMR* | gpioService[1399]/sysfsGpio T=main | gpioSysfsUtils.c gpioSysfs_SetChangeCallback() 596 | Only one change handler can be registered
Nov 29 11:42:52 swi-mdm9x28-wp user.info Legato:  INFO | gpioService[1399]/sysfsGpio T=main | gpioSysfsUtils.c gpioSysfs_SessionCloseHandlerFunc() 1178 | Releasing GPIO 22

Read full topic
